reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major thyroid neoplasm types: papillary carcinoma (~6 per 100k), follicular carcinoma (~1.5 per 100k), medullary carcinoma (~0.3 per 100k), anaplastic carcinoma (~0.2 per 100k), plus benign adenomas (~10+ per 100k). Umbrella term includes vastly heterogeneous malignant and benign entities with different clinical significance.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC), compiled from regional cancer registries
